org.GameLogic.Handler

Class GameManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.GameLogic.Handler.GameManagement

  • public class GameManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class of the game server. All messages are routed here and every game is created and managed in this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
